topics.title: Describe a Happy Memory
topics.prompt: Talk about a happy moment in your life and explain why it was special.
topics.hint: 請描述一個讓你快樂的回憶，可以說明時間、地點和感受，約3～5句。
topics.sample: One happy moment was when I went to the beach with my family. We played games and ate ice cream. I felt very joyful because I was with my loved ones.

topics.title: Express Your Feelings About Friendship
topics.prompt: Explain what friendship means to you and how friends help each other.
topics.hint: 說明你對友情的看法，可以說明朋友為什麼重要，約3～5句。
topics.sample: Friendship means trust and support. Good friends help each other during hard times. They also make life more fun.

topics.title: Talk About Hope and Dreams
topics.prompt: Describe a hope or a dream you have for your future.
topics.hint: 談談你的夢想或希望，可以描述目標和期待，約3～5句。
topics.sample: I hope to become a teacher one day. I want to help students learn and grow. This dream motivates me to study hard.

topics.title: Describe a Place That Makes You Feel Peaceful
topics.prompt: Talk about a place where you feel calm and relaxed and explain why.
topics.hint: 描述一個讓你感到平靜的地方，可以說說地點和原因，3～5句。
topics.sample: My favorite place is the park near my home. It is quiet and has many trees. When I go there, I feel calm and happy.

topics.title: Share an Experience of Overcoming Sadness
topics.prompt: Describe a time when you felt sad and how you overcame it.
topics.hint: 講述一段感到難過的經歷，以及你如何讓自己好起來，約3～5句。
topics.sample: I was sad when I lost my pet. My family helped me feel better by spending time with me. Slowly, I began to smile again.

topics.title: Explain What Laughter Means to You
topics.prompt: Talk about why laughter is important in your life.
topics.hint: 說明笑聲對你的意義，可以提到它帶來的感覺或影響，約3～5句。
topics.sample: Laughter makes me feel happy and relaxed. It helps me forget worries for a moment. I like to laugh with my friends.

topics.title: Describe a Small World You Know
topics.prompt: Talk about a small community or group you belong to and what makes it special.
topics.hint: 描述你所屬的小社群或團體，包括成員和活動，約3～5句。
topics.sample: I am part of a small book club at school. We meet every week to share stories. It feels special because we all love reading.

topics.title: Imagine a World Without Borders
topics.prompt: Imagine what life would be like if the world was smaller and everyone could be friends.
topics.hint: 想像一個沒有界限，大家都是朋友的世界，可以說說你的感受和想像，3～5句。
topics.sample: If the world was smaller, people would understand each other better. There would be less fighting. Everyone could live happily together.
